cmipaccess.spiritx.global_data_access.get_global_time_series(model, experiment, variable, realisation, **kwargs)[source]¶
cmipaccess.spiritx.global_data_access.get_global_toa_energy_budget(model, experiment, no_parent=False, remove_if_control_less_than='max', warn_too_short_control=True, convert_time_to_datetime=True, progress=True, add_control_mean=False, **kwargs)[source]¶

Load global mean time series of tas, rsut, rlut, rsdt and eei for the given model and experiment. Time series are by default detrended by the control experiment.

cmipaccess.spiritx.path_search module¶

cmipaccess.spiritx.path_search.get_path_CMIP5_data(model, experiment, realisation, variable, freq='mon')[source]¶

Returns the local path to the corresponding CMIP5 datasets if the data exist on spirit.

Realisation can be “first” in which case the first r1iXpXfX is selected if available, if not another realisation is chosen.

cmipaccess.spiritx.path_search.get_path_CMIP6_data(model, experiment, realisation, variable, freq='mon', grid=None)[source]¶

Returns the local path to the corresponding CMIP6 datasets if the data exist on spirit.

Realisation can be “first” in which case the first r1iXpXfX is selected if available, if not another realisation is chosen.

cmipaccess.spiritx.path_search.get_path_CMIP_data(model, experiment, variable, realisation, grid=None, generation=None, freq='mon')[source]¶

Returns path to access gridded CMIP data from either CMIP5 or CMIP6

grid : default is ‘gn’ native grid, only for CMIP6 freq : can be ‘mon’, ‘day’, ‘3h’ or else, see CMIP documentation source : can be ‘spirit’ for local access or ‘esgf’ for remote access esgf_fallback : if source is ‘spirit’ but the dataset is not found, tries to get remote data from esgf generation : specify the generation wanted : either ‘CMIP5’ or ‘CMIP6’. If None, it tries CMIP6 first then CMIP5 which can be slower.

cmipaccess.spiritx.path_search.print_list(model_list)[source]¶
